Ditz: help

Documented commands (type help <topic>):
========================================
EOF            archive    config  help  reconfigure    shortlog  todo    
add            assign     drop    init  release        show      unassign
add_component  changelog  edit    log   releases       start     validate
add_reference  close      export  path  set_component  status  
add_release    comment    grep    quit  shell          stop    

Ditz: help todo
todo [-a,all] [release] -- Generate todo list
